values.value: Creates an Opportunity with associated OpportunityLineItems in a single transaction

This action creates a new Opportunity along with its associated products (OpportunityLineItems) in a single atomic transaction.

Features:

  • Create opportunity with standard fields (Name, AccountId, StageName, CloseDate, etc.)
  • Add multiple products with pricing and quantity
  • All-or-none transaction support
  • Automatic Pricebook2Id handling for line items
  • Field-level security checks automatically applied
